# Wealth (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** Add [[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]] to your list of cleric class skills. You gain [[Skill Focus (Feat)|Skill Focus]] ([[Appraise (Skill)|Appraise]]) as a bonus feat.

**Wealth Domain Spells**

**1 [[Alarm (Spell)|Alarm]]:** Wards an area for 2 hours/level.

**2 [[Obscure Object (Spell)|Obscure Object]]:** Masks object against scrying.

**3 [[Glyph of Warding (Spell)|Glyph of Warding]] <sup>M</sup>:** Inscription harms those who pass it.

**4 [[Detect Scrying (Spell)|Detect Scrying]]:** Alerts you of magical eavesdropping.

**5 [[Secret Chest (Spell)|Secret Chest]] <sup>F</sup>:** Hides expensive chest on [[Ethereal Plane]]; you retrieve it at will.

**6 [[Forbiddance (Spell)|Forbiddance]] <sup>M</sup>:** Blocks planar travel, damages creatures of different alignment.

**7 [[Sequester (Spell)|Sequester]]:** Subject is invisible to sight and scrying; renders creature comatose.

**8 [[Discern Location (Spell)|Discern Location]]:** Reveals exact location of creature or object.

**9 [[Antipathy (Spell)|Antipathy]]:** Object or location affected by spell repels certain creatures.
